snippet.title: The Marvellous Miss Take Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Marvellous Miss Take is out now for PC and Mac on Steam! Go to the steam page:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/327310

In the bustling heart of London, a once magnificent art collection has been unscrupulously poached and split up among private collectors. Meet Sophia Take, the rightful heir to the misappropriated masterpieces. Help Sophia to reclaim her inheritance on an exciting and daring adventure across the capital!

More information about the game in the official website:
http://www.misstakegame.com/

More information about Rising Star Games titles in the official website:
http://www.risingstargames.com
